entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PlatformNotSupported after system updates (Ubuntu 22.04 LTS x64) #75427
  • System.Numerics.IModulusOperators inconsistencies with naming and documentation #75426
  • Add EventSource/EventCounter tracing and metrics for WebSockets #75420
  • [7.0][garbage collector] Performance issue for non-concurrent server garbage collection #75419
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.InstanceDataTests.InstanceDataCollectionCollection tests failing in CI #75417
  • bugs: System.Int128 operator * and % at overflow #75416
  • Unnecessary add emitted for repeated multiplication #75413
  • Analyzer suggestion: Don't perform bitwise operations on non-Flags enums #75412
  • buiLd runtime C:\WINDOWS was unexpected at this time. #75410

Closed

  • BoundedChannelReader.TryRead deadlocks if WriteAsync called in parallel thread while at capacity #75418
  • Deadlock SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync/Release when call Release and Dispose from another Task #71706
    Future
  • NativeAOT for osx-arm64 #64337
    8.0.0
  • Reloc failures with NativeAOT on Apple Silicon #67232
    Future
  • Native Generate MapFile? #75409
  • [P/Invoke] Tuples should be marked with LayoutKind.Sequential instead of LayoutKind.Auto #75388
  • Distributed transactions: AccessViolationException on arm64 #74170
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests work item failures #75378
  • LibraryImport fails to Marshal ByValTStr (SYSLIB1051) #75376
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize call doesn't return and continues to run for large lists. #73992
    Future
  • Add "Create" method to EqualityComparer<> class #24460
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JitDisasm cosmetic improvements #75425
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • load msquic early to avoid interference with RemoteExecutor #75424
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75423
    area-System.Net
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Modify XmlSerializators to use typed XmlWriter.WriteValue method #75415
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Draft fix for a series of multiplications (#75413) #75414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix broken `dotnet-runtime-perf` #75408
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [release/7.0] Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline errors #75406
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline

Merged

  • Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75344
    area-System.Net
  • [NativeAOT/macOS] Link to libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl on macOS #75333
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Initial osx-arm64 bring up #75264
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74226
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Fix slow perf for serializing large payloads and add test #75147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75384
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Make forward sub a little bit more precise in GLOB_REF tagging #75404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Replace marshalled delegate in X509Certificate verification #75401
    area-System.Security
  • Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} #75396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Use RhpCheckedAssignRef from RyuJIT backend when location of address is unknown #1989
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change all cases of RhpAssignRef to RhpCheckedAssignRef #1988

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum Issue with DynamoDB and .Net core 3.1 #27813

Closed

  • mongodb-org-server depends on libssl1.1 (>= 1.1.1); however: Package libssl1.1 is not installed. #25441
  • How we can Copy One directory from another one #22634

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1989769 #27667
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Produce a warning and ignore Prefer32Bit for netcoreapp #27796

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Discussion: Permit static lambda assignment to function pointers #3476
  • Champion: "Partial Type Inference" #1349
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extract base class doesn't remove `sealed` modifier #63929
  • PdbWriter.SerializeDebugInfo() drops extern namespaces if the first method is a synthesized method #63927
    17.4
  • CS0657 diagnostic suppressor is not reflected in IDE/errors (but it is in build output) #63923
  • IntelliSense is hard-selecting item not matching the case I'm writing #63922
  • After upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspace from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 it started throwing at runtime #63921
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.3.0 fail to build source generators #63919

Closed

  • Generate Method generates doubly nullable struct types when used with null coalescing operator #63883
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32911.17 #63925
  • New Rename UI it too bright in dark theme :) #63643
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue caused by merges of two PRs that conflicted with each other. #63931
    Area-IDE
  • Use attributes consistently in tests. #63930
    Area-IDE
  • Do not serialize extern namespaces to synthesized method #63928
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Do not go back from Solution snapshot to Workspace in Metadata-as-Source #63869
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix type inference in coalesce expression #63884
    Area-IDE, Next
  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use common pattern for traits in tests #63893
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63924
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add binding for textbox colors #63914
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change test import ordering based on runtime globalization library #63853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63880
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • Move diagnostic tagging to 'pull diagnostics' #63858
    Area-IDE
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature flag #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext #43914
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes_dapper #43913
  • Identity UserManager.AddToRoleAsync is querying the role with normalized name instead of the name column #43912
  • System.NullReferenceException: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' bilgiislem.Models.Hesap.Role.get returned null. #43911

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes_dapper #43864
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #43899
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #43908
  • Hot reload isn't working - aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js isn't being injected into the page #41732
    Discussions
  • Application parts manager can't ingest hubs #43859

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1989827 #43907
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HorizontalStackLayout does not limit maximum width of child label to it's width #10046
  • facing issue and that is : installation while downloading .net maui #10045
  • Hide "Loading..." behind the splash screen or any other solution #10044
  • Infinite ScrollView with BlazorWebView #10043
  • Using SelectionChangedCommand with CollectionView in Shell.FlyoutContent results in Win32 Unhandled Exception #10041
  • CascadeInputTransparent = false not work #10040

Closed

  • Calling GetCurrentLocation().Result will freeze the application #10042

PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow MAUI to be built using .NET 7 #10047

Updated

  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028
    7.0-rc2
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10030
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add foreign key to existing property with converter and explicit column name #29050
  • InvalidOperationException: 'Set operation can't be applied on entity 'Customer' because temporal operations on both arguments don't match.' #29049

PullRequests

Created

  • Testing for query strings and various type mapping fixes #29051

Updated

  • Query : Add support for final GroupBy operator #28972
  • Query: Support for GroupBy entity type #29019
  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
    blocked
